CHANGES
=======

0.6
---


0.5.1 (2012-03-23)
------------------

* member groups
* Pyramid 1.3
* bugs fixed

0.5 (2012-03-02)
----------------

* AJAX
* build.concurrent option
* dynamic menu
* better search engine
* workspace -> storage
* pfbackup
* publiquiz

0.4 (2012-01-12)
----------------

* description fields for groups, workspaces, processors, projects and
  processings
* online creation and edition for users, groups, workspaces and projects

0.3 (2011-11-21)
----------------

* XML configurations
* cache

0.2 (2011-09-05)
----------------

* Pyramid version
* workspaces
* processings

0.1 (2010-12-10)
----------------

* initial version in Pylons
* workspaces only
